_header: Saint Matthew the evangelist / Tells us today how Christ
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4939.
_description: Gospel for the Third Sunday after the Octave of Epiphany in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte mathewe þe euangelisteTellis vs to daye how ihesu
                    criste…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of þir wormis will i tellA tale if ȝe will here my
                    spell

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Matheu þe EwangelystTelleþ vs to day hou
                    crist…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of þeos wormes wol I spelleAnd a tale ȝif ȝe
                    wol here me telle
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Assendente Ihesu in nauiculam secuti sunt (f.
                    176vb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Matheu þe euangelistTelles vs þis day howe ihesu
                    crist…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And of þese wormes & ȝe wille duelleA litel
                    tale I wille ȝowe telle
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica quarta post octavam Epiphanie secundum Mathium (p.
                    69)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt matthew oe Euangelistetelliþ vs þis day how
                    crist…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…of these wormys I wile spellea tale if ȝe herin me
                    telle

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sant Mathu þe euangelysteTels vs today of ihesu
                    criste…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Of þir wormes wyll I tellA tale If ȝe will here my
                    spell
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiiia post octabas epiphanie secundum Matheum
                    (f. 41)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint matheu and þe ewangelysteTelles vs to day of ihesu
                    cryste…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Off þeir wormes will I tellA tale yf ȝe wyll her my
                    spell

EDCPCM.First Lines:
sAin matheu þe wangelisteTellis us to dai hou
                    crist…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…And of eir wormes wil I tellA tal yef ye wil her mi
                    spelle
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiia post octavam epiphanie secundum matheum (f.
                        32ra)

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt mathew þe euangilestetelles vs to day of ihesu
                    criste…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…and of þise wormes wyll I tella tale ic yfe ȝe wyll
                    here my spell
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica iija post octavas Epiphanie Secundum Matheum (f.
                    14)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint mathew þe wangelystTellyth vs to day who
                    crist…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Of þir wormys wil I ȝow tellA tale ȝyff
                    ȝe wil hyre my spell
